description: This file defines a Flutter widget called ScoreBar that displays the current score and best score in a game, styled with an Ocean theme. It includes sub-widgets for individual score display (ScorePill) and relies on external game provider and constants for data.

classes.name: ScoreBar
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays current score and best score with themed styling.

classes.name: _ScorePill
classes.description: A private stateless widget used within ScoreBar to display individual score information with custom styling.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for ScoreBar and _ScorePill, pulling data from GameProvider and applying Ocean theme styling.
